item.description:
Live Viewing Japan Inc. will give Japanese pop culture lovers two great surprises! They are going to deliver high quality video and audio live streaming (recorded videos) at our local movie theater.

Hatsune Miku (a singing synthesizer application with a female persona, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hatsune_Miku) Live Party 2011 39's LIVE in Sapporo screening will be held on November 10th, 2011 ($20 Admission Fee)

The next event will feature a famous Japanese rock band ,L'Arc-en-Ciel (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/L%27Arc-en-Ciel), 20th L'Anniversary Live on November 29th, 2011. ($20 Admission Fee) When this 2 day concert happened in May, the 100 thousand tickets were completely sold out.

Tickets are available online through pre-order only and will NOT be available for purchase onsite. To get your tickets, please visit http://www.regsvc.com/registration/index.aspx?TYPE=T&ID=63&LC=&PIN=&REF=&dbGUID=132D9336-1AE3-4856-9B25-C6EAF1C0A7DB&; Hope to see you there!
item.name: Hatsune Miku Live in Sapporo & L'Arc-en-Ciel Live Viewing @ Fenway 13 Theatre
